mosinstall.name: mfSlideBar
mosinstall.author: Marcofolio.net
mosinstall.description:
mfSlideBar allows you to add a nice sliding sidebar to your Joomla! website.

Setup

Publish this module on any position. Set the module position it should load and other paramaters and you're ready to go.

Never use the same module position as it's loaded in. For example, when you placed mfSlideBar in position "left", do not load other modules from position "left". Otherwise you'll create an infinate loop & your website will crash.

Change the "Image width" to the width of the original image in px when placing mfSlideBar on the right, otherwise it will not show up properly in every web browser.

This module is best viewed when "Show title" is set to "No".

Themes

mfSlideBar comes default with three themes: dark, light & simple. To create your own theme, add them in hem in the following directory:

modules/mod_mfslidebar/templates/

Now create a directory starting with your theme name and if it's placed on the left or right. Seperate those with a "-" symbol. Add your own "slide-button.gif" and "slide-button-active.gif" that fits your template. Place your template in your module parameters and you're done.

Example:

modules/mod_mfslidebar/templates/newTemplate-right/

Support

Please visit Marcofolio.net and leave me a message.

Version 1.0, 2008

Don't forget to publish this module!

param.name: loadmodule
param.label: Load module position
param.description: Set the module position to load (left, right, user1 etc.). NEVER use the same position as the position from this module.

param.name: pos
param.label: Position
param.description: On which side should the sidebar be positioned?

param.name: toppos
param.label: Margin from top
param.description: Set how many px the sidebar should be loaded from the top.

param.name: theme
param.label: Load theme
param.description: Select which theme to load (Defaults are dark, light & simple). Read the description how to use.

param.name: concolor
param.label: Color of the box
param.description: Set the color of the box in HEX value.

param.name: conwidth
param.label: Width of the box
param.description: Set the width of the box in pixel value.

param.name: conheight
param.label: Height of the box
param.description: Set the height of the box in pixel value.

param.name: conpadding
param.label: Padding of the text
param.description: Set the padding of the text in pixel value.

param.name: imgwidth
param.label: Width of the image
param.description: Set the width of the image in pixel value.

param.name: imgheight
param.label: Height of the image
param.description: Set the height of the image in pixel value.

param.name: imgalt
param.label: ALT of the image
param.description: Set the ALT attribute of the image

param.name: titleshow
param.label: Show title of modules
param.description: Should the module inside the slidebar show their titles.
